{{main|List of Fordham University people}} This article lists '''notable people associated with [[Fordham University School of Law]]''' in [[New York City]], [[New York]], organized into rough professional areas and listed in alphabetical order.
==Judges== [[File:Denny Chin.jpg|thumb|right|125px|Judge Denny Chin]] * [[Vincent L. Farrell]] '25, judge who presided over the trial of bank robber [[Willie Sutton]].<ref>Pace, Eric. Accessed October 11, 2009.</ref> * [[Arthur Gonzalez]] '82, Judge, [[United States Bankruptcy Court|U.S. Bankruptcy Court]] (1995-present); presided over [[Chrysler]], [[Enron]] and [[MCI Inc.|WorldCom]] bankruptcies * [[Irving Kaufman]] '31, Chief Judge, [[United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit]] * [[John F. Accessed November 16, 2007. "JACK FORD was struggling to make ends meet back in the spring of 1973, finishing his second year at Fordham University Law School, when he ran into a college friend."</ref> * Jim Leitner '82, President of Falcon Management * [[G. Gordon Liddy]] '57, [[Watergate]] conspirator, nationally syndicated radio talk show host * [[John Mara]] '79, President and [[Chief operating officer|COO]], [[New York Giants]] * [[Lara Jill Miller]] '91, actress, best known for her role as Samantha "Sam" Kanisky on the TV [[sitcom]] ''[[Gimme a Break!]]'' * [[Walter O'Malley]] '30, owner of the [[Los Angeles Dodgers|Brooklyn Dodgers]] who moved the team from [[Brooklyn]] to [[Los Angeles]] * [[Howie Roseman]], General Manager of the [[Philadelphia Eagles]]
